title: Angular Route Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic route definition in the given project.

path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the component?

inlineTemplate.description: Include template inline in the component.ts file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

standalone.description: Whether the generated component is standalone.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to the generated component selector.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project.

skipImport.description: Do not import this component into the owning NgModule.

baseUrl.description: The HTML selector to use for this component.

skipBaseUrl.description: Specifies if the component should have a selector or not.
